review: Amazing device for the price, especially once you install Kodi/xmbc. The remote is rather difficult to use and takes some time to get used to. I have one in every room in the house rather than a cable box. Do yourself a favor and pick one up, then install Kodi. Kodi can not be installed on any of the other devices from Amazon's competitors.The only real downside is it's need of 1A, 5V, which forces you to run a cable to wall outlet rather than be able to run with the power off the hdmi. But that doesn't take away any stars in my opinion.
author: Oryana Villegas

review: Set up was so easy anyone could do it. Came to me the very next day after ordering. No complaints here

review: I like having it on my TV.  It shows me what is available without hesitation or confusion.  It is impossible for me to listen to music.  The pieces start and then are interrupted while the feature re-loads.  I find that while I am watching a Netflix program, the picture stops and the voices continue, then the picture races to catch up to the audio.
